Others: The Chicago Bulls improved to 2-2 on the season as they picked up a narrow win against the Memphis Grizzlies on the road.
The Bulls trailed by as many as 20 points at one point in the game, but managed to come back and win.
Jalen Smith, Julian Phillips, Lonzo Ball, and Ayo Dosunmu all had good games off the bench for the Bulls.
The Bulls tied their franchise record on Monday night as they knocked down 25 threes.
The Bulls will be back in action on Wednesday night at home as the Orlando Magic will be coming to town.
